post:
MyRSK webhosting solutions has **recently** entered the budget vps market. However, we have been providing webhosting solutions since 2009 locally - in Dubai for young entrepreneurs and startup companies.

Instead of just following the "herd" and offering budget VPS plans, we intended to do something more unique. We offer **free management** in our plans. Some of them come with semi-management, and others come with full management. You do not have to pay a single dollar. From installations, to configurations, to migrations - its all on us :)

We are currently in the process of developing our own **in-house panel** which will pretty much automate everything. So in the near future we hope to give clients access to do a lot of things (such as; ordering additional IPs instantly, changing plans instantly, etc.), without the need of ever contacting support - smooth and slick!



512M Plan
===============
512MB RAM Guaranteed
50GB HD
200GB BW
semi-management
$6/month
